Description: You are here:>>>>Job DescriptionOxfam is a global movement of people working together to end the injustice of poverty.The Role:Oxfam GB-Iraq Program is looking forScope and MethodologyGender Justice Structures & Processes and 'Living Our Values' - Gender-Just HR Policies and Practices:Collaborative Management, Decision-Making, and Resources Mobilization:Organizational Resilience & Sustainability and Environmental Best Practices:What we are looking for:How to apply:Cover letterThe financial proposalStatement on the willingness to follow Oxfam’s Code of Conduct and guidance regarding safe programming.Any incomplete offer, i.e. not including one or more of the above items will be considered ineligible and not evaluated.Individual applications for work in the form of a CV (with or without a cover letter) will be considered ineligible and not evaluated.20th Of September 2023WVL-ME Organizational Capacity DevelopmentWVL-ME Organizational Capacity Developmentno later than 18th September 2023, 5 pmThis invitation to tender has been issued for the sole purpose of obtaining offers for the provision of the services requested in this TOR. Oxfam reserves the right not to enter in or award a contract as a result of this invitation to tender. Oxfam also reserves the right to terminate any contract issued as a result of this invitation to tender as set out in the contract terms and conditions.Job Details
